import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { TextField, Typography, Grid, Button, FormControl, InputLabel, Select, MenuItem } from '@mui/material' import { ExpenseTrackerContext } from '../../../context/context' const initialState = { amount: '', category: '', type: 'Income', date: new Date() } const Form = () => { const {addTransaction} = useContext(ExpenseTrackerContext); const createTransaction = () => {} const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState); return (
Type Category setFormData({...formData, category: e.amount.value})} /> setFormData({...formData, category: e.date.value})} />
) } export default Form;
